title: Why is scientific development a factor in developing societies to reach the highest levels in various fields, especially in the sports field? - Quora

response.answer_text: Our most excellent Olympic athletes would most of them be nowhere without the most advanced modern scientific development. Few of them are Ababe Bekila’s, who won the Oplympic marathon without Nikes on his bare feet. Swimmers break world records with swimsuits that may derive from the technology of nuclear submarine hull coverings(?). Etc. But, on the other hand, all that technology is not much use for a duffer. The technology needs a human being who has “muscle memory” to make good use of it.
